text: Whataburger is a fast food restaurant that specifically makes hamburgers. It was founded in 1950 in the city of Corpus Christi, Texas. The restaurant chain was completely on portable stands until the first permanent store was built in 1961. Most Whataburger locations are open for all 24 hours in the day. ==References== == Other websites == *Official website Category:1950 establishments in the United States Category:American fast food restaurants Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Corpus Christi, Texas Category:1950s establishments in Texas
title: Whataburger
